summary: Public-facing federal websites should be user-friendly. To achieve this, the 21st Century Integrated Digital Experience Act requires federal agencies to ensure their websites meet 8 modernization requirements. For example, websites should be accessible, mobile-friendly, and searchable. How did agencies do in 2023? We looked at 24 large agencies that provide high-impact services through their websites. title: Digital Experience: Agency Compliance with Statutory Requirements
